Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insight][Vehicle Utilisation Report]Open Vehicle Utilisation Page
Description: Test case to verify successful navigation and loading of Vehicle Utilisation Report page in GPS Manager GPS Insights
Precondition: 1. User is logged in; 2. GPS Manager is accessible; 3. GPS Insights section is available
Steps: 1. Navigate to GPS Manager GPS Insights section; 2. Locate Vehicle Utilisation Report option; 3. Click on Vehicle Utilisation Report link; 4. Wait for page to load completely; 5. Verify page title displays correctly; 6. Confirm all report elements are visible; 7. Verify report is ready for configuration
Expected Result: 1. GPS Manager GPS Insights section is accessible; 2. Vehicle Utilisation Report option is visible; 3. Report page navigation completes successfully; 4. Page loads without errors; 5. Page title displays Vehicle Utilisation Report; 6. All report configuration elements are visible; 7. Report interface is ready for user interaction

Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insight][Vehicle Utilisation Report]Set From Date
Description: Test case to verify date picker functionality for setting start date in Vehicle Utilisation Report
Precondition: 1. Page loaded; 2. Date picker is accessible; 3. User has date selection permissions
Steps: 1. Locate the From Date field in the report interface; 2. Click on the year field to open date picker; 3. Select year 2025 from the year dropdown; 4. Navigate to January month selection; 5. Select day 1 from the calendar; 6. Verify selected date is displayed correctly; 7. Click done to confirm date selection
Expected Result: 1. From Date field is visible and accessible; 2. Date picker opens successfully when year field is clicked; 3. Year 2025 is selected and displayed correctly; 4. January month is accessible for selection; 5. Day 1 is selected and highlighted; 6. Selected date 1-Jan-25 is displayed in the field; 7. Date selection is confirmed and picker closes

Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insight][Vehicle Utilisation Report]Set To Date
Description: Test case to verify date picker functionality for setting end date in Vehicle Utilisation Report
Precondition: 1. From date selected; 2. Date picker is accessible; 3. User has date selection permissions
Steps: 1. Locate the To Date field in the report interface; 2. Click on the year field to open date picker; 3. Select year 2025 from the year dropdown; 4. Navigate to January month selection; 5. Select day 3 from the calendar; 6. Verify selected date is displayed correctly; 7. Click done to confirm date selection
Expected Result: 1. To Date field is visible and accessible; 2. Date picker opens successfully when year field is clicked; 3. Year 2025 is selected and displayed correctly; 4. January month is accessible for selection; 5. Day 3 is selected and highlighted; 6. Selected date 3-Jan-25 is displayed in the field; 7. Date selection is confirmed and picker closes

Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insight][Vehicle Utilisation Report]Select Vehicles
Description: Test case to verify vehicle selection functionality in Vehicle Utilisation Report filters
Precondition: 1. Date range selected; 2. Vehicle selection is accessible; 3. Vehicles CAO-8070 and VEH-3500 exist in system
Steps: 1. Locate the vehicle selection field in the report interface; 2. Search for vehicle 8070 in the selection list; 3. Select CAO-8070 from the search results; 4. Verify CAO-8070 is added to filter; 5. Search for vehicle 3500 in the selection list; 6. Select VEH-3500 from the search results; 7. Verify both vehicles appear in filter selection
Expected Result: 1. Vehicle selection field is visible and accessible; 2. Vehicle search functionality works correctly for 8070; 3. CAO-8070 is found and available for selection; 4. CAO-8070 is selected and added to filter successfully; 5. Vehicle search functionality works correctly for 3500; 6. VEH-3500 is found and available for selection; 7. Both vehicles appear in filter selection correctly

Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insight][Vehicle Utilisation Report]Execute Utilisation Report
Description: Test case to verify search execution functionality in Vehicle Utilisation Report
Precondition: 1. Filters selected; 2. Search button is accessible; 3. Valid search criteria are configured
Steps: 1. Verify all required filters are properly configured; 2. Locate the Search button in the report interface; 3. Confirm Search button is enabled and clickable; 4. Click on Search button to execute report; 5. Wait for search processing to complete; 6. Verify search results begin to load; 7. Confirm vehicle utilisation metrics are displayed
Expected Result: 1. All required filters are properly configured and visible; 2. Search button is visible and accessible in interface; 3. Search button is enabled and ready for interaction; 4. Search action is triggered successfully; 5. Search processing completes without errors; 6. Search results begin to load in report; 7. Vehicle utilisation metrics are displayed correctly

Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insight][Vehicle Utilisation Report]Validate Utilisation Data
Description: Test case to verify data accuracy and completeness in Vehicle Utilisation Report results
Precondition: 1. Data loaded; 2. Report results are visible; 3. Utilisation metrics contain expected information
Steps: 1. Review the loaded report data for utilisation metrics; 2. Verify Vehicle Name column contains correct vehicle information; 3. Check Total KMs column displays distance values; 4. Confirm Max Speed(KMPH) column shows speed data; 5. Validate Average Speed(KMPH) column contains calculated values; 6. Verify No Of Jobs column displays job counts; 7. Confirm On The Job Total Kms column shows job-related distances
Expected Result: 1. Loaded report data displays utilisation metrics clearly; 2. Vehicle Name column shows correct vehicle information for each row; 3. Total KMs column displays accurate distance values; 4. Max Speed(KMPH) column shows correct maximum speed data; 5. Average Speed(KMPH) column contains accurate calculated values; 6. No Of Jobs column displays correct job count values; 7. On The Job Total Kms column shows accurate job-related distance data

Title: [GPS Manager][GPS Insight][Vehicle Utilisation Report]Match UI and Download
Description: Test case to verify data consistency between UI display and downloaded Excel data in Vehicle Utilisation Report
Precondition: 1. Results displayed; 2. Export functionality is accessible; 3. Download capability is available
Steps: 1. Locate the UI table displaying utilisation results; 2. Verify export or download functionality is available; 3. Execute export/download action for current results; 4. Open downloaded file in appropriate application; 5. Compare UI table data with exported file data; 6. Verify all row values match exactly; 7. Confirm data consistency between UI and export
Expected Result: 1. UI table displaying utilisation results is visible and accessible; 2. Export or download functionality is available for current report; 3. Export/download action executes successfully; 4. Downloaded file opens correctly in application; 5. UI table data can be compared with exported data; 6. All row values match exactly between UI and export; 7. Complete data consistency confirmed between UI and exported file
